text: The 2020 FIM Motocross World Championship is the 64th FIM Motocross World Championship season. It includes 20 events, starting at Matterley Basin on 1 March and ending at Neuquén, Argentina on 22 November. No races were held from April to July due to the COVID-19 pandemic. ==Race calendar and results== The championship will be contested over nineteen rounds in Europe, Asia and South America.
